name: Project Puppet
description:
Project Puppet is basically puppetman but a remake it was taken down earlier this year because of an illegal ads id so i lost the source code to remove the ads so i have decided to make a remake and add a whole lot more based on suggestions from this discord server https://discord.gg/V5U2w7b which you can also join if you have a discord account the original description from the original game on the play store is

A autorun includes your player to run.. well automatically.. in this game it includes directional pads, coins, stars, customization options, spikes, red pipes and more

This project vision is to be launched on Steam if you would like please post suggestions in the comments of this chat or on the discord channel mentioned earlier
